title: Consumer Centric Flexible Demand Management
content: Traditional demand response is a proven and effective tool to address peak energy demand. In this model, consumers respond to a call for action by the electric grid operator. It is an effective—but blunt—instrument and one that will continue to play an important role in responding to times when the grid is stressed.
author: Penni McLean‐Conner
